jekinmakwana: Understanding your sub-conscious mind with intellect is one thing than actually experiencing it’s power. And this is where Meditation 🧘‍♂️ comes in. It basically bridges the gap between Conscious and Subconscious. With practice and persistence this gap is gone, and she is then Superconscious. And as Doc mentioned, universal mind. Subconscious mind works on universal laws or Dharma. Better your karma, better you’ll be able to control it. But as they say, doing all these thing is easier said than done. But intellectually understanding this concept is also very important. @eishachopra
